DOC.brief_summary: Multicenter Study of the Safety and Efficacy of Adalimumab in Subjects with Moderate to Severely Active Psoriatic Arthritis Subjects with Inadequate Response to Disease Modifying anti-Rheumatic Drug Therapy
DOC.brief_title: Study of the Safety and Efficacy of Adalimumab in Subjects With Moderate to Severely Active Psoriatic Arthritis Subjects With Inadequate Response to Disease Modifying Anti-Rheumatic Drug Therapy
DOC.criteria: Moderate to severe PsA Inadequate response to DMARD therapy Corticosteroid stable dose <=10 mg QD DMARDs must have been taken for 3 months and stable dose for 4 weeks MTX maximum dose = <=30 mg/week Active chronic plaque PS or documented history of chronic plaque PS No other active skin disease
